system.description: You are able to make Copperajah-class Curries as a Camp Action. One of these Curries restores 100% of the party's max HP. After making a Copperajah-class Curry, roll a d100. On a 1-20, you attract a non-hostile Pokemon from the local environment to investigate the camp.
